sections.title: Projects
sections.description: I've completed one full project with HTML, CSS, JQuery and PHP, which was my wedding website last year.  I have also started my own Ruby On Rails application for makeup shade searches. The project is unfinished but deployed on heroku for display. I am also familiar with Java, Angular JS, Github, WordPress, Chrome Web Developer Tools, Bootstrap, AJAX and SQL. All my websites are responsive to different devices. Browse through my project to see what they're all about!

sections.title: Courses
sections.description: I took Object Oriented Programming in Java while going to college. Since then, I have extended my knowledge with a few free courses from the Ruby on Rails specialization on Coursera.

sections.title: Education
sections.description: I graduated from Virginia Tech in 2012 with a bachelor's of science in Chemical Engineering. I graduated Magna Cum Laude with a GPA of 3.6.

sections.title: Experience
sections.description: I worked for CS Mining, LLC in southern Utah as a Metallurgical Test Engineer and then as a Process Engineer. While working there, I developed models for the plant in excel, determined process design criteria, handled and organized process data, and interacted with operators on daily basis.
